flawed_nl_solution:
Nora has saved 5*6 = <<5*6=30>>30 dollars
This means that Tamara has saved 30/3 = <<30/3=10>>10 dollars
All together, they have saved 30 + 10 + 6 = <<30+10+6=49>>49 dollars
If they pay off the debt they will remain with 49 - 40 = <<49-40=9>>9 dollars
Dividing the remaining money equally will give each girl 9/3 = <<9/3=3>>3 dollars.
